title: RL包里的吸血附魔是来自哪个MOD?
author: 鼠喜欢喵喵
txt_content: PS:其实就是想要这个MOD的汉化。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xmdhs 于 2020-1-4 09:26 编辑 

能说下英文名是什么吗。

我不知道哪个是吸血

找到了，应该是 So Many Enchantments 
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/so-many-enchantments

Lifesteal: Not to be confused with blessed edge's heal function (in later versions, it will have a significant difference), deals additional extra damage against all and like blessed edge, its heal depends on your attack damage and its level. (Applicable to swords primarily by natural.)


汉化也有。。https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-926201-1-1.html

replies.author: Mr_fengfeng
replies.txt_content: 默默地说神秘的神秘工匠也有这个附魔就是砍怪有吸血=-=

replies.author: 鼠喜欢喵喵
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-4 09:22
能说下英文名是什么吗。

我不知道哪个是吸血
那怎么使用呢， = =。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
鼠喜欢喵喵 发表于 2020-1-4 11:23
那怎么使用呢， = =。
替换你现在 mods 文件夹中的 mod 即可



somanyenchantments+V0.4.31.jar
(459.57 KB, 下载次数: 11)



2020-1-4 11:27 上传
点击文件名下载附件
